constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 79 (Friday, May 7, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CARTWRIGHT:
H.R. 3020.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 3 (relating to the power of
Congress to regulate Commerce with foreign Nations, and among
the several States, and with the Indian Tribes.)
[Page H2152]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Education and Labor, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Coronavirus Frontline Workers Fair Pay Act
